output.name: rlog
output.doc: Matrix containing expression values after regularized log (rlog) transformation. Set parameter 'rlog' to true for this output to be produced.

output.name: vst
output.doc: Matrix containing expression values after variance stabilizing transformation (VST). Set parameter 'vst' to true for this output to be produced.

output.name: voom
output.doc: Matrix containing expression values after edgeR/voom transformation. Set parameter 'voom' to true for this output to be produced.

parameter.name: caption
parameter.default: Cluster heatmap of sample-to-sample distances. Blue and red indicates high and low similarity between samples, respectively.

parameter.name: rlog
parameter.doc: If true, cluster heatmap based on regularized log (rlog) transformation is included in report.

parameter.name: vst
parameter.doc: If true, cluster heatmap based on variant stabilizing transformation (VST) is included in report.

parameter.name: voom
parameter.doc: If true, cluster heatmap based on voom (edgeR) transformed data is included in report.
